item.title: Journalists Draw Link Between Internet Dead Zones, Threatened Medicaid Cuts, and Health
item.description: KFF Health News journalists made the rounds on national or local media recently to discuss topical stories. Here’s a collection of their appearances.

item.title: At Trump’s FDA, Anti-Regulatory Approach and Cost-Cutting Put Food Safety System at Risk
item.description: Get our weekly newsletter, The Week in Brief, featuring a roundup of our original coverage, Fridays at 2 p.m. ET.

item.title: American Doctors Are Moving to Canada To Escape the Trump Administration
item.description: Canada has seen a surge of American doctors seeking to move north in the months since President Donald Trump returned to the White House.

item.title: Opioid Settlement Windfall: Where the Billions Are Going
item.description: Opioid manufacturers, distributors, and retailers have been paying billions of dollars to settle lawsuits over their role in the overdose epidemic. Ho...

item.title: Recortes en servicios de idiomas generan temor a errores médicos, diagnósticos equivocados y muertes
item.description: Cerca de 69 millones de personas en el país hablan un idioma que no es inglés, y 26 millones de ellas hablan inglés, pero no con fluidez.
